img_summary: The image depicts a scene from a video game where a character is engaged in combat with an opponent wielding a large axe. The environment appears to be a dimly lit, ancient or mystical setting, with stone flooring and decorative elements. The interface shows health bars for both characters, with the opponent labeled as "Non Pure." Various icons are visible on the screen, likely representing abilities or items available to the player.
